item.description:
Lets go out and do a little dancing and enjoy the ambiance of this fab looking place wow I notice they have  a fire place!! this will be a treat for me "a new place", I checked out the menu the appetizers look awesome, if there is enough interest for dinner will do a small reservation for 10, Saturdays are tough for large crowds so please include in your RSVP or comment section for dinner Please be firm if you respond..I have heard the band before and they are good.

 

 

Stonewood Tavern  is a beautiful spot that still retains a comfortable and casual air. ... NEWHALL PLAZA 139 LYNNFIELD ST, Suite 200, PEABODY, MA  PH: 978-531-5311.

stonewoodtavernpeabody.com

 

Band: Lee Hawkins Rock/Cover/Blues

Time: 9: 12:00am
item.name: Lee Hawkins Duo at Stonewood Tavern Peabody
